# PKPayLaterAction.calculator

**Case**

An action the provides the standard price breakdown calculator for Apple Pay Later.

## Declaration

```swift
case calculator
```

## Widget behaviors

- **PKPayLaterAction.learnMore**: An action that displays a button that a person can tap to learn more about Apple Pay Later.

items.description: An action that displays a button that a person can tap to learn more about Apple Pay Later.
